title: The End Of The Line
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2O48m7M

by silvia93

They had four stones. Thanks to Scott and some wibbly wobbly time jumps and a few trips in the Quantum Realm they managed to obtain four Infinity Stones: Reality, Time, Space, Mind and Power.

They had the Infinity Gauntlet. Thanks to Thor’s friend Eitri and Tony ‘s designs.

They also had the theory, based more on blind hope than actual facts, that theirs friends and loved ones were trapped inside the Soul Stone and that the snap could be reversed.

When Steve and Tony arrived on Vormir, four stones, a gauntlet and that theory were all they got.

Words: 2001, Chapters: 1/1, Language: English

  • Fandoms: Marvel Cinematic Universe, The Avengers (Marvel Movies), The Avengers (Marvel) - All Media Types
  • Rating: Teen And Up Audiences
  • Warnings: Major Character Death
  • Categories: Gen
  • Characters: Tony Stark, Steve Rogers, Red Skull, Pepper Potts, Natasha Romanov (Marvel), James “Bucky” Barnes, Clint Barton, Laura Barton, Sam Wilson (Marvel), James “Rhodey” Rhodes, T'Challa (Marvel), Okoye (Marvel), Shuri (Marvel), Bruce Banner, Guardians of the Galaxy Team, Wanda Maximoff, Thor (Marvel), Peter Parker, Scott Lang, Hope Van Dyne, Stephen Strange, Peggy Carter
  • Relationships: Pepper Potts/Tony Stark, James “Bucky” Barnes/Natasha Romanov, Clint Barton/Laura Barton, Scott Lang/Hope Van Dyne, Peggy Carter/Steve Rogers
  • Additional Tags: Post-Avengers: Infinity War Part 1 (Movie), Avengers: Infinity War Part 1 (Movie) Spoilers, Avengers 4, Avengers 4 rumors, Angst, Angst with a Happy Ending, ..I guess, Soul Stone (Marvel)


read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2O48m7M

summary:
Parker: Don't worry, the doctor says I wasn't hurt that badly.
Stark: Thank god.
Parker: Yeah he says the bleeding is all...
body:
Parker: Don't worry, the doctor says I wasn't hurt that badly.
Stark: Thank god.
Parker: Yeah he says the bleeding is all internal.
Stark: WHAT? 
Parker: isn't that where the blood is supposed to be?
Stark: OH MY GOD

summary: Requests are open for this character. This whole thing is all empty right now. I told you it was empty, there’s nothing yet on...
body:
Requests are open for this character.

This whole thing is all empty right now.

I told you it was empty, there’s nothing yet on this masterlist.

Like really nothing, besides pretty banners. Don’t you think they’re pretty?

When I said nothing, I did mean nothing…

summary: Kid: Man, Morgan, your dad is Iron Man! He must be so cool! Morgan: Ugh, my dad is NOT cool. Just last week he got upset because...
body:
Kid: Man, Morgan, your dad is Iron Man! He must be so cool!

Morgan: Ugh, my dad is NOT cool. Just last week he got upset because I forgot to tell him good night.

blog.name: ao3feed-tonystark
blog.title: Ao3-Feed: Tony Stark
blog.description: This blog is an automated list of the stories posted on Archive Of Our Own under the Tony Stark tag. The stories are automatically posted here from the AO3 RSS feed.

title: Relativity
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2MXVMKx

by deniigiq

Peter weighed throwing his drink in Harry’s face and storming out divorcée-style with pretending to go into anaphylactic shock to escape this interaction.

They were both pretty good.

He needed to take his badge off first, either way.

Words: 5184, Chapters: 2/?, Language: English

Series: Part 3 of Inimitable Verse

  • Fandoms: Spider-Man - All Media Types, Daredevil (TV), Deadpool - All Media Types
  • Rating: Not Rated
  • Warnings: No Archive Warnings Apply
  • Categories: Gen, M/M, Multi
  • Characters: Peter Parker, Harry Osborn, Matt Murdock, Franklin “Foggy” Nelson, Tony Stark, Wade Wilson, and more as we go along, Oscorp
  • Relationships: Harry Osborn & Peter Parker, Harry Osborn/Peter Parker, not a whole lot guys don’t trip, Matt Murdock & Peter Parker & Wade Wilson, Matt Murdock & Peter Parker, Peter Parker & Wade Wilson, Matt Murdock/Franklin “Foggy” Nelson, Peter Parker & Tony Stark
  • Additional Tags: okay so being straight honest here this isn’t a harry/peter fic, Stalking, Legal Drama, Panic Attacks, Past Relationship(s), peter is a petty shit sometimes, and we love him for it, Team Dynamics, Team as Family, Team Red, emotional distress, Peter is 25 in this fic

body:

by DoctorsBadWolf

He’s so tired of hearing, “It didn’t hurt at all,” but it did. It did! But…he couldn’t tell them that. Not while they were recovering too.

title: Baby-Boy
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2MZ2BeV

by pkmarvel

Wade Wilson was a popular man, for many reasons. He owned the best club in all of New York, gave money to charities, and is the greatest leader of the adored gang, X-Force. Sometimes referred to as Deadpool, its his job to make sure nobody gets a piece of his city. So when his men start dropping like flys, Wade starts digging around for information.
Peter Parker didn’t mean to get fired from his job, get a new one, and become a target of a very bad, very dangerous mafia. But, life happens. So when his and Wades world collides, Peter has to make a choice, one that could change the fate of New York City, for the best, or for the worst.

I know I suck at summary’s but please read and give this story a chance!

Words: 1300, Chapters: 1/1, Language: English

  • Fandoms: Spider-Man/Deadpool - Joe Kelly (Comics)
  • Rating: Explicit
  • Warnings: Graphic Depictions Of Violence
  • Categories: M/M
  • Characters: Omega Peter Parker - Character, Alpha Wade Wilson - Character, Michelle Jones, Tony Stark, Aunt May
  • Relationships: Wade Wilson/Peter Parker
  • Additional Tags: Alternate Universe - Modern: No Powers, Fluff and Smut, lots of smut, but not til later chapters, Shy Peter Parker, Adorable Peter Parker, BAMF Wade Wilson, BAMF Peter Parker, Sane Wade Wilson


read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2MZ2BeV

blog.description:
I love,,, Tony Stark

They / them / she / her -

summary:
Alright. 
So Tony and Peter's dad/son relation ship is super cute, super popular. We love it. 
Peter and Loki's being friends is...
body:
Alright.

So Tony and Peter’s dad/son relation ship is super cute, super popular. We love it.

Peter and Loki’s being friends is super cute, popular as well. (And canon from comic books, uh ??)



Then why the hell aren’t Loki, Peter and Tony popular as a family ??? It’s super really cute guys !! Plus adding Loki’s children from Norse mythology..!!!

Give them more love
